hero.badge: Master Data Management Built with Rust
hero.subtitle: RDataCore (read: ratacore) is a self-hosted master data management platform built with Rust. Connect Shops, PIM, CRM, ERP, and any system. Fast, secure, and delightfully flexible. Your middleware, your way!
hero.footnote: Free for developers, educators & small teams. No credit card needed! üéâ

self_hosted.label: Self-Hosted
self_hosted.desc: Your data never leaves your server

features.title: Everything You Need for Data Integration
features.subtitle: Our comprehensive MDM solution provides all the tools you need to manage, sync, and integrate your master data across every system.

data_flows.title: Data Flows From A to B üîÑ
data_flows.subtitle: RDataCore sits in the middle, connecting all your systems
data_flows.footnote: üîÑ Real-time bidirectional sync keeps everything in harmony

flexible.title: Flexible, Performant, & Yours ü¶Ä
flexible.subtitle: RDataCore adapts to your workflow, not the other way around. Built for power users who demand flexibility without sacrificing performance.

workflow.title: Extensive Workflow Management
workflow.desc: Design custom workflows that match your organization's processes. Automate data transformations, validation rules, and approval chains. Build triggers, conditional logic, and error handling.

import_export.title: Import/Export Anything
import_export.desc: Integrate with any system via our flexible import/export engine. Pull data from REST APIs, databases, CSV files, XML, JSON, or webhooks. Export to any format. Your data, your way.

custom_api.title: Custom API Endpoints
custom_api.desc: Create your own API endpoints to expose your data exactly how you need it. Build custom integrations, webhooks, and data pipelines. Full OpenAPI documentation included.

auth.title: Multiple Auth Mechanisms
auth.desc: OAuth 2.0, SAML, LDAP, Active Directory, or build your own. RDataCore integrates with your existing identity provider. Multi-factor authentication built-in.

integrations.title: 3rd Party Integrations
integrations.desc: Connect to Shopify, WooCommerce, Salesforce, SAP, and hundreds of other systems. Pre-built connectors and the ability to easily add new ones. Bi-directional sync included.

performance.title: Rust Performance
performance.desc: Built with Rust for memory safety and blazing speed. Handle millions of records without breaking a sweat. Low resource usage, high throughput. ü¶Ä

final_cta.title: Ready to Connect Your Data?
final_cta.subtitle: Join the sloth revolution! Download RDataCore for free or get a commercial license for your organization. Either way, you're in for a treat!

hero.title: Slow & Steady Wins the Security Race
hero.subtitle: We're Slothlike, and we believe that taking it slow doesn't mean being behind. Built with Rust, powered by passion, and fueled by an unhealthy amount of coffee ‚òï

story.title: Our Story üìñ
story.paragraph1: Slothlike was founded by a team of developers who were tired of bloated, cloud-only MDM solutions that compromised on privacy and performance. We asked ourselves: "What if we built something different?" ü§î
story.paragraph2: Armed with Rust, a love for open source, and a sloth mascot (because why not?), we created RDataCore‚Äîa self-hosted MDM platform that's fast, secure, and actually fun to use!
story.paragraph3: Today, RDataCore is used by developers, startups, educational institutions, and enterprises who value privacy, performance, and a bit of playfulness in their software. We're still a small team, but we're growing‚Äîslowly, of course! ü¶•

values.title: Our Values üíé
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our slothful journey

security.title: Security First üõ°Ô∏è
security.desc: We prioritize the security and privacy of your data above all else. Built with Rust for memory safety!

open_source.title: Open Source ‚ù§Ô∏è
open_source.desc: Transparency is key. Our code is open, our community is welcoming, and our sloths are friendly!

fast.title: Blazingly Fast ‚ö°
fast.desc: Rust powers RDataCore, making it faster than a caffeinated sloth!

developer_love.title: Developer Love ‚òï
developer_love.desc: Made by developers, for developers. Free forever for small teams and education.

squad.title: Meet the Sloth Squad ü¶•
squad.subtitle: A small but mighty team of developers who take security seriously (but not themselves)

tech_stack.title: Built with Modern Tools üîß
tech_stack.subtitle: RDataCore is built on a foundation of cutting-edge technologies designed for performance, scalability, and developer experience.

rust.name: ü¶Ä Rust
rust.desc: Memory-safe, blazingly fast, and concurrent. The foundation of RDataCore's performance.

actix.name: Actix
actix.desc: Actor-based async web framework for handling thousands of concurrent connections.

postgresql.name: PostgreSQL
postgresql.desc: Reliable, ACID-compliant database for storing master data entities.

redis.name: Redis
redis.desc: In-memory caching and message queuing for high-performance operations.

openapi.name: Swagger/OpenAPI
openapi.desc: Auto-generated API documentation for seamless developer experience.

vue.name: Vue 3
vue.desc: Progressive JavaScript framework for building reactive user interfaces.

pinia.name: Pinia
pinia.desc: Intuitive state management for Vue applications.

router.name: Vue Router
router.desc: Official routing library for seamless navigation.

vuetify.name: Vuetify
vuetify.desc: Material Design component framework for beautiful UIs.

architecture.title: Containerized Architecture
architecture.callout: Every component is built for asynchronous operation, enabling RDataCore to handle thousands of concurrent integrations with minimal resource usage.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To build the most secure, performant, and privacy-respecting MDM platform on the planet. Self-hosted, open-source, and built with Rust. Because your data should be yours, and security shouldn't be slow! üöÄ

hero.title: Pay Based on Your Ability
hero.subtitle: All licenses include ALL features. No restrictions. No limits. No compromises. We price based on your organization's size and ability to pay, not on feature access.
hero.callout: ‚ù§Ô∏è Every license gets the complete RDataCore experience

whats_included.title: What's Included? Everything. üöÄ
whats_included.subtitle: Every license tier gets the full power of RDataCore. No feature gates, no upsells.
features: Import/Export from any source (CSV, XML, JSON, APIs)
Connect to Shops, PIM, CRM, ERP systems
Multiple authentication mechanisms (OAuth, SAML, LDAP, etc.)

flexibility.title: Built for Flexibility & Performance ‚ö°
flexibility.desc: RDataCore is designed to adapt to your workflow. Import data from any source, export to any destination, create custom API endpoints, and integrate with your existing systems. Whether you need OAuth, SAML, LDAP, or custom authentication‚Äîwe've got you covered. Rust-powered performance meets enterprise-grade flexibility! ü¶Ä

cloud.title: Cloud Version Coming Soon!
cloud.desc: Don't want to self-host? We're working on a managed cloud version. Stay tuned!

free_licenses.title: Free Licenses üéÅ
free_licenses.subtitle: We believe in supporting developers and education. All features, forever free!

community.title: Community Edition
community.desc: Perfect for freelancers, developers, start-ups, and SMBs

company_licenses.title: Company Licenses üè¢
company_licenses.subtitle: Fair pricing for commercial organizations based on size
company_licenses.equality: ‚ù§Ô∏è Same features as free version ‚Ä¢ Same power ‚Ä¢ Same flexibility

society_licenses.title: Society Licenses üåç
society_licenses.subtitle: Special pricing for NGOs, private schools, and universities
society_licenses.equality: ‚ù§Ô∏è All features included ‚Ä¢ Supporting good causes

corporate.title: Corporate Edition
corporate.desc: 500+ Employees? Let's create a custom licensing agreement. Same features, fair pricing tailored to your organization.

items.question: Do different licenses have different features?
items.answer: Nope! Every license‚Äîfree or paid‚Äîgets ALL features. We price based on your organization's ability to pay, not on feature access. No artificial limits, no upsells. Everyone gets the complete RDataCore experience! üéâ

items.question: Why do you charge different prices then?
items.answer: We believe in fair pricing based on ability to pay. A startup shouldn't pay the same as a large corporation. This model lets us support developers and educators for free while staying sustainable as a company. ü¶•

items.question: What's included in all licenses?
items.answer: Everything! Unlimited devices, extensive workflow management, API integrations, custom endpoints, multiple auth mechanisms (OAuth, SAML, LDAP), import/export, and all future updates. Self-hosted on your infrastructure.

items.question: Can I switch between licenses?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Contact us and we'll help you transition smoothly.

items.question: Is the source code available?
items.answer: Yes! RDataCore is open-source. You can inspect, modify, and contribute to the code. The Community and Education editions are completely free with full access.

items.question: What about the cloud version?
items.answer: We're currently self-hosted only, but a managed cloud version is in the works! For now, you deploy RDataCore on your own infrastructure‚Äîwhich means your data never leaves your control. üîí

seo.description: Legal information and contact details for Slothlike GmbH

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: Your privacy is important to us. This website is designed with privacy in mind - we do not collect, store, or track any personal data.

data_collection.title: Data Collection
data_collection.text: We do not collect any personal data from visitors to this website. No information is logged, stored, or transmitted to any third parties.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: This website does not use any cookies. We do not store any information in your browser.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.text: We do not use any analytics, tracking tools, or third-party services on this website. Your visit is completely private.

your_rights.title: Your Rights
your_rights.text: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
items: Right to information about stored data
Right to correction of incorrect data

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.text: We use technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against accidental or intentional manipulation, loss, destruction, or access by unauthorized persons.

changes.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.text: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy to reflect changes in our data processing practices or legal requirements.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or data protection, please contact us at the address provided in the imprint.

seo.title: Privacy Policy - RDataCore
seo.description: Learn how we protect your privacy and handle your personal data

hero.title: Building the Future of MDM
hero.subtitle: See what we've accomplished and what's coming next. We're committed to continuous improvement and transparency in our development process.

done.title: Completed Features
done.subtitle: These features are live and ready to use today

features.title: Users & Roles
features.desc: Comprehensive user management with role-based access control. Define custom roles, permissions, and user hierarchies to match your organization's structure.

features.title: Workflows
features.desc: Powerful workflow engine for automating data processes. Create complex data transformation pipelines with conditional logic, error handling, and approval chains.

features.title: Async Execution
features.desc: Non-blocking asynchronous job processing for high performance. Handle thousands of concurrent operations without impacting system responsiveness.

features.title: Extensive Caching
features.desc: Multi-layer caching system powered by Redis. Dramatically improve response times and reduce database load with intelligent cache invalidation.

features.title: Entity Definitions
features.desc: Flexible entity schema definitions with a wide range of field types, validation rules, and relationships. Model any data structure you need.

features.title: Admin API Documentation
features.desc: Complete OpenAPI documentation for administrative endpoints. Full API reference with examples, authentication details, and response schemas.

features.title: Public API Documentation
features.desc: Comprehensive documentation for public-facing APIs. Enable partners and customers to integrate seamlessly with detailed guides and examples.

features.title: Docker Setup
features.desc: Fully containerized deployment with Docker and Docker Compose. Deploy to any infrastructure with minimal configuration and maximum portability.

features.title: Workflow DSL
features.desc: Domain-specific language for defining workflows. Write complex data transformations and business logic in a simple, readable format.

features.title: Tree View of Entities
features.desc: Hierarchical visualization of entity relationships. Navigate complex data structures with an intuitive tree-based interface.

open.title: Coming Soon
open.subtitle: Features we're actively working on or planning to implement

features.title: SSO Integration
features.desc: Single Sign-On support for enterprise identity providers including GitHub, Google, Azure AD, Okta, and SAML-based systems. Seamlessly integrate with your existing authentication infrastructure.

features.title: Extensive DSL Extension
features.desc: Enhanced workflow DSL with additional functions, operators, and built-in utilities. More powerful data transformations with less code.

features.title: Advanced Field Types
features.desc: Extended field type library for entity definitions including rich text, geolocation, file attachments, JSON schemas, and custom composite types.

features.title: Custom Field Validations
features.desc: Define custom validation rules using JavaScript expressions. Create complex business logic validators specific to your domain requirements.

features.title: Entity List Views
features.desc: Customizable list views with advanced filtering, sorting, and search capabilities. Save filter presets and create custom views for different user roles.

features.title: Enhanced Tree View
features.desc: Improved tree view with drag-and-drop reordering, bulk operations, parent control mechanisms, and better handling of large hierarchies.

seo.title: Roadmap - RDataCore
seo.description: See what we've built and what's coming next for RDataCore MDM platform

hero.title: How Teams Use RDataCore
hero.subtitle: From e-commerce to enterprise systems, see how RDataCore solves real data integration challenges across industries.

intro.title: Powerful Data Integration Made Simple
intro.description: RDataCore excels at mass import and export of data across multiple formats and systems. Whether you're working with CSV files, JSON data, third-party APIs, or our flexible REST API, we make data integration seamless.

cases.title: Use Cases
cases.subtitle: Five powerful ways to leverage RDataCore in your organization

items.title: Single Source of Truth
items.description: Import customer data from your online shop and aggregate it with orders, support requests, and interactions across multiple channels. Create a unified customer profile that serves as the definitive source of truth for your entire organization.

items.title: Data Collector
items.description: Actively fetch data from various sources‚Äîdatabases, APIs, file systems, and third-party services‚Äîand consolidate everything into your CRM system. Automate data collection workflows to maintain up-to-date, aggregated records without manual intervention.

items.title: Public Communicator
items.description: Provide a secure entry point for partners and external systems to access your data through a public API. Use pre-shared keys or API tokens to control access and enable seamless B2B data exchange while maintaining security.

items.title: Central Data Aggregator
items.description: Use RDataCore as your central MDM instance where all tools and services send their data. Collect and aggregate any type of information‚Äîproducts, customers, orders, inventory‚Äîas long as you've defined the entity schema. One central hub for all your data.

items.title: Data Formatter & Calculator
items.description: Transform data on-the-fly from one format to another. Take CSV input from legacy systems and convert it to JSON for modern APIs. Apply calculations, field transformations, and data enrichment during the conversion process without storing intermediate results.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Data Workflow?
cta.subtitle: See how RDataCore can solve your specific integration challenges. Try our demo or get in touch to discuss your use case.

seo.title: Use Cases - RDataCore
seo.description: Discover how organizations use RDataCore for data integration, aggregation, and transformation
